name: US Flight Co
about: US Flight Co is a premier flight school located in Des Moines, Iowa, dedicated to providing top-notch aviation training. Our mission is to create a professional and supportive atmosphere where students can achieve their flying goals. With a diverse fleet of modern aircraft, including brand new Pipistrel Alpha Trainers and legacy Cessna 172s, we offer comprehensive training in various weather conditions, ensuring pilots gain invaluable experience in real-world scenarios. Our instructors are highly experienced, with real-world flying backgrounds, and are committed to helping students succeed. Located within a state-of-the-art facility at Des Moines International Airport, we provide excellent facilities, in-house maintenance, and a student-first approach. Our small operation ensures personalized attention and a relaxed learning environment. Join us to embark on your aviation career with the best resources and support.
